tool_description: Validates page numbering format, placement, and sequence according to academic document standards.

document_path.description: Path to document file for page numbering analysis

numbering_style.description: Expected numbering style: arabic, roman, or mixed

error_messages: File not found: The specified document path does not exist.
Invalid numbering style: Use arabic, roman, or mixed.
Unsupported file format: Only Word documents and PDFs support page numbering analysis.
Cannot access page information: Document format prevents page analysis.
usage: Provide document_path and optionally specify numbering_style to validate page numbering compliance with academic standards.

numbering_consistent.description: Whether page numbering is consistent throughout

total_pages.description: Total number of pages in document
